author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft launches Office 2016 for Windows: Home & Student is $149, Home & Business is $229 - newsR
text: Following the release of Office 2016 for Mac in July, Microsoft launched Office 2016 for Windows today. Microsoft announced Office 2016 in January and released the first preview for Windows back in March. While the test version of the productivity suite was free, this isn’t true for the final release: You either have to pay […] »
